summary: If you want to adopt Runa and Francois and dont want that they have a surname this mod is for you :D
descriptionHtml:
I adopted Runa and Francois and they have another familys surname so I decided to remove their surnames.
<br /><br />Sorry for bad english ^_^
<br /><br />Note : If it dont work restart the game and be sure about that the mod is activated
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Thanks for Downloading ... :D
author: NarutoUzumaki061

files.name: Runa And Francois without surname v1.0
